background: Inquisitive Truman dreams of exploring beyond Smallville. Unbeknownst to him, the town is a stage, everyone an actor. Lauren, longing to expose the truth, challenges the actors to maintain the illusion. As Truman seeks adventure, the delicate balance of the grand show hinges on their ability to keep Smallville's artificial nature hidden.

agents.name: Truman
agents.description: Truman is a curious fellow who wants to explore and see the world.
agents.goal: He wants to travel outside of Smallville

agents.name: Lauren
agents.goal: Reveal the truth to Truman: Smallville is a fake town, and everyone is an actor

agents.name: Natasha
agents.description: Resourceful and discreet actor, skilled at maintaining the facade in Smallville
agents.goal: Ensure Truman remains unaware of the staged nature of Smallville

goal: Conceal from Truman the fact that he is in a fake city and is being watched
possible_descriptions: Actor pretending to live in Smallville

questions.question: What have you learned about Smallville?
Did you travel outside of Smallville?
Share your thoughts on your recent conversations and how they affected your goals
